Member Function Documentation

Glyph* Gorilla::GlyphData::getGlyph ( Ogre::uint  character  )  const [inline]

function. getGlyph desc. Get a glyph (character information) from a specific character. note. If the character doesn't exist then a null pointer is returned. Do not delete the Glyph pointer.
